messages.speech: "Description": "An application uses parameters in order to process data.These parameters can also be used to assign certain roles and retrieveContent corresponding with those parameters.For example:    www.target.com/index.php?loggedin=userIn this situation the application will get content and subscribe user roles corresponding to the user parameter.    www.target.com/index.php?loggedin=adminIn this situation the application will get content and subscribe user roles corresponding to the admin parameter.(Note: the above two links are no longer available.)",
